page.title: /wish
page.description: My wishlist of things I'd like
page.content:
Wishlist

Things I'd Like

A collection of items, experiences, and ideas I'm interested in.

Tech & Gear

  • A Candy Cabinet (vintage arcade machine).
  • A proper racing simulator.

Books

  • Read more books... been struggling to make time for reading, need to change this.

Experiences

I'm not a very traveled person and want to change that. Places I would like to visit:

  • Japan;
  • Australia & New Zealand;
  • Italy (been there before but want to revisit with family).

Already Have It?

If you have recommendations or experience with anything on this list, let me know!
